ValidationRule.description: Ensures that for Swedish Opportunities, when Contract Category is set to “Change to existing call off/agreement,” the field New or Renewal must be “Renewal.”
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Category__c, "Change to an active call off or contract"), ISPICKVAL(New_or_Renewal__c, "New"), $User.Country = "Sweden" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Swedish Opportunities, when Contract Category is “Change to existing call off/agreement,” the field New or Renewal must be set to “Renewal.”
